title: May 03, 2024 — Snowflake Model Registry – General Availability | Snowflake Documentation
paragraphs: We are pleased to announce that the Snowflake Model Registry is now generally available as of Snowpark ML (snowflake-ml-python) package version 1.5.0. The Snowflake Model Registry allows you to securely store, manage, and use machine learning models in Snowflake, where your data already lives. The registry supports most popular types of Python ML models and can be used from both Python and SQL.
For more information, see Snowflake Model Registry.
